com.persistit

Class Management.JournalInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.persistit.Management.AcquisitionTimeBase
      • com.persistit.Management.JournalInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Enclosing interface:
    Management

    public static class Management.JournalInfo
extends Management.AcquisitionTimeBase
    Structure that describes the current state of the journal manager.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public int getPageMapSize()
        Returns:
        the pageMap size

      • getBaseAddress

        public long getBaseAddress()
        Base address is the journal address of the first record required for recovery.
        Returns:
        the start generation

      • getLastValidCheckpointTimestamp

        public long getLastValidCheckpointTimestamp()
        Returns:
        the time stamp of latest valid Checkpoint

      • getLastValidCheckpointSystemTime

        public long getLastValidCheckpointSystemTime()
        Returns:
        the system time (in millis) of the latest valid Checkpoint

      • getLastValidCheckpointAge

        public long getLastValidCheckpointAge()
        Convenience method to return the elapsed time since the last valid checkpoint was written.
        Returns:
        the elapsed time in seconds since the latest valid Checkpoint

      • getLastValidCheckpointJournalFile

        public String getLastValidCheckpointJournalFile()
        Returns:
        the name of the journal file to which the last valid checkpoint record was written

      • getLastValidCheckpointJournalAddress

        public long getLastValidCheckpointJournalAddress()
        Returns:
        the file address of the last valid checkpoint record

      • getRecoveryJournalFile

        public String getRecoveryJournalFile()
        The current journal file being recovered during startup. After recovery is compete, the name of the last journal file used during recovery.
        Returns:
        the journal file from which a recovery operation was last performed.

      • getRecoveryJournalAddress

        public long getRecoveryJournalAddress()
        Address within journal file currently being recovered during startup. After recovery is complete, the address after the last recovered record.
        Returns:
        the current recovery file address.

      • getRecoveryStatus

        public long getRecoveryStatus()
        Return one of the following values:
        Long.MINVALUE if recovery has not begun yet
        -1 if recovery ended after a "dirty" (abruptly terminated) shutdown
        0 if recovery completed after a "clean" (normal) shutdown
        N > 0 if recovery is in progress, in which case N represents the approximate number of remaining bytes of journal data to process.
        Returns:
        the recovery status.

      • getJournaledPageCount

        public long getJournaledPageCount()
        Returns:
        the total number of pages written to the journal

      • getCopiedPageCount

        public long getCopiedPageCount()
        Returns:
        the total number of pages copied from the journal back to their Volumes.

      • getDroppedPageCount

        public long getDroppedPageCount()
        Returns:
        the total number of pages dropped from the journal due the existence of newer versions

      • getReadPageCount

        public long getReadPageCount()
        Returns:
        the total number of pages read from the journal back into buffer pool.

      • getRecoveredCompletedTransactions

        public int getRecoveredCompletedTransactions()
        Returns:
        the count of recovered uncommitted transactions

      • getRecoveredCommittedTransactions

        public int getRecoveredCommittedTransactions()
        Returns:
        the count of recovered committed Transactions

      • isClosed

        public boolean isClosed()
        Returns:
        true iff the journal has been closed

      • isCopying

        public boolean isCopying()
        Returns:
        true iff the JOURNALCOPIER task is currently copying pages to their Volume files.

      • isFlushing

        public boolean isFlushing()
        Returns:
        true iff the JOURNALFLUSHER task is currently forcing file modifications to disk.

      • isAppendOnly

        public boolean isAppendOnly()
        The appendOnly flag suspends copying of pages to their Volume files.
        Returns:
        true if the appendOnly flag is set.

      • isFastCopying

        public boolean isFastCopying()
        Returns:
        true if fast page copying is enabled. Fast copying copies pages as fast as possible without regard to disk utilization.
